Reader Settings Help

Each reader can be given a name and an associated door location. Direction Type indicates whether the reader is for entry or exit.

Each reader can be assigned to a door that can be assigned to a actuating relay.

The panels below show how Reader1 is connected to Door1 that controls Relay1.

Lasly, be sure to enable the reader and save any changes.


This Main Door is connected to Reader1 from the Readers panel above.


This Relay1 is connected to the Door1 from the Doors panel above, and is ultimately connected to Reader 1.
Delay time decides how long the relay triggers on output.

Again, be sure to save any changes.
